text: I was being chased by a giant dog through a dark forest.
I was swimming in a clear blue ocean with dolphins around me.
I was travelling over the meadow and enjoyed the early sunrise.

I was walking along a golden beach at sunrise, feeling peaceful and full of joy. The waves sparkled like diamonds and a gentle breeze filled me with happiness and gratitude. I met my loved ones and we laughed together, surrounded by bright light and warmth.

I was trapped in a dark, decaying building with no way out. The walls were closing in and I could hear terrifying screams echoing through the hallways. I tried to run but my legs felt like lead. Shadows were chasing me and I felt overwhelming dread and panic. Everything around me was collapsing and I kept falling through endless darkness, feeling utterly hopeless and terrified.
